mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (TITLE, CONTENT, CATEGORY, MEMBERID) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{category}, #{memberId})
INSERT INTO REVIEWFILE (REVIEWNO, SAVEDFILENAME, USERFILENAME, FLAG) VALUES (#{reviewNo}, #{savedFileName}, #{userFileName}, #{flag})
mapper.select: select REVIEWNO, TITLE, CONTENT, CATEGORY, MEMBERID from REVIEW where REVIEWNO = #{ reviewNo }
SELECT REVIEWFILENO, SAVEDFILENAME, USERFILENAME, REIVEWNO, FLAG FROM REVIEWFILE WHERE REVIEWNO = #{ reviewNo } AND FLAG = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEWNO = #{ reviewNo }
DELETE FROM REVIEWFILE WHERE REVIEWFILENO = #{ reviewFileNo }
